page.title: 11Life In The Day Of A Priest
page.content: { At 7.30 a.m. Fr. John Fox, senior {curate for the Parish of Desertcreight {& Derryloran,}otherwise known as {Cookstown,}begins his day. { At 8.00a.m.}he celebrates public {Mass in Holy Trinity Church, (pic 4) {After Mass}there is a parishioner who calls into the sacristy requesting him to visit a sick relative later in the day.{Breakfast at 8.45 a.m.}in the parochial house is prepared by the good & faithful housekeeper. This is the time{Fr. Fox}opens & checks his mail & reads the morning newspapers. {Our parish priest Canon P. {Hughes,51 years ordained,}celebrates public{10.00a.m. Mass}each morning. It is at this time that{Fr. Fox}prays the {Holy Office of the Church}in the privacy of his own living quarters & plans his forth_coming day. { 1.00p.m. lunch}is followed by a walk
